member.name: M:Metrics.InfluxDB.Model.InfluxUtils.JoinTags(System.String,Metrics.MetricTags[])
member.summary: Parses any tags from the and concatenates them to the end of the specified list. If there are multiple tags with the same key in the resulting list, tags that occur later in the sequence override earlier tags. The can be a single tag value or a comma-separated list of values. Any values that are not in the key/value pair format ({key}={value}) are ignored. One exception to this is if the only has a single value and that value is not a key/value pair, an will be created for it using "Name" as the key and itself as the value.
member.param: The item set name, this is a comma-separated list of key/value pairs.
The tags to add in addition to any tags in the item set name.
member.returns: A sequence of InfluxTags that contain the tags in followed by any valid tags from the item name.
